metadata.name: Artisan Journey Page Redesign - Vertical Storytelling
metadata.description: Converted from HTML vertical storytelling layout into repository JSON template with brand variables and dynamic placeholders.

props.className: mt-4 text-lg md:text-xl text-[var(--brand-text-secondary)] max-w-3xl mx-auto

children: {{content.header.text || 'Unfolding the story behind each creation, a continuous ribbon of passion, dedication, and artistry.'}}

props.className: relative py-12 md:py-16 max-w-5xl lg:max-w-6xl mx-auto px-4
absolute top-0 bottom-0 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 w-1 bg-[var(--brand-primary)] opacity-20 rounded
relative mb-16 flex flex-row-reverse items-stretch gap-6
z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl border-l-4 border-[var(--brand-accent)]

children: {{content.timeline.items[0].text || 'Every piece begins as a fleeting thought, an idea sparked by the beauty of the world around us. This is where the journey begins, with a vision waiting to be brought to life.'}}

props.className: z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl border-r-4 border-[var(--brand-terracotta)]

children: {{content.timeline.items[1].text || 'We travel far and wide to find materials that not only meet our standards of quality but also tell a story of their own. Each material is chosen for its character, sustainability, and ability to embody the initial spark.'}}

props.className: w-1/2 flex items-center justify-center bg-[var(--brand-primary)]/10 p-4 rounded-md

children: {{content.timeline.items[1].quote || '"The material is the first verse of the poem."'}}

props.className: relative mb-16 flex flex-row-reverse items-stretch gap-6
z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-[var(--brand-primary)] text-white rounded-lg shadow-2xl

children: {{content.timeline.items[2].text || 'With skilled hands and unwavering focus, raw materials begin their transformation. This stage is a delicate dance of tradition and innovation, where years of expertise are poured into every detail, shaping form and function.'}}

props.className: z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl
text-xl md:text-2xl italic text-[var(--brand-highlight)] border-l-4 border-[var(--brand-accent)] pl-6

children: {{content.timeline.items[3].quote || '"Every masterpiece has its moment of doubt. The art is in pushing through."'}}

{{content.timeline.items[3].text || 'The path is not always smooth. There are moments of challenge that test our resolve. These trials are part of the story, embedding resilience and character into the final piece.'}}

props.className: relative mb-16 flex flex-row-reverse items-stretch gap-6
z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl border-l-4 border-[var(--brand-secondary)]

children: {{content.timeline.items[4].text || 'The final stage is one of meticulous refinement. Each piece is polished, inspected, and perfected. It's a testament to our commitment to excellence, ensuring the creation is not just finished, but truly complete.'}}

props.className: relative mb-4 md:mb-8 flex items-stretch gap-6
z-10 w-6 h-6 rounded-full border-4 border-[var(--brand-primary)] bg-[var(--brand-secondary)] absolute left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
w-1/2 relative p-6 md:p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl text-center

children: {{content.timeline.items[5].text || 'From a simple spark to a tangible masterpiece, the journey is complete. The final creation stands as a testament to the artisan's soul, carrying its story forward to a new home.'}}

props.className: mt-8 flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4 justify-center
bg-[var(--brand-accent)] text-white font-semibold py-3 px-8 rounded-md shadow-md hover:bg-opacity-90 transition-all duration-300

children: {{content.footer.line2 || 'A celebration of global craft and timeless design.'}}
